name: The Three Kingdoms of Destiny
storyline: The plot of The Three Kingdoms of Heaven is an aerial history, because the Yellow Emperor defeated Chiyou in ancient times, and sealed it deep in the earth, at the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the court collapsed, the group of men and up, natural disasters continue, the people displaced, at this time the dragon King to save the world, to take out the dragon ball buried in the depths of the dragon palace to stop the flood, do not want to touch the seal of Chiyou, Chiyou took this opportunity to divide 108 spirits to escape the place, and possessed themselves among the various forces so that one of them could one day collect the spirits of the other 107 generals and be reborn.
summary: The Three Kingdoms of Destiny is a turn-based strategy simulation game, the opening has four different characteristics of the monarch representing 4 countries for players to choose, there are as many as 100 controllable generals, rich transfer system and rich skills of generals,
